Comment: Taking China's market leverage away limits the amount of money they can make - charging a small premium for something might mean doubling the profit margin on it if the margin was narrow to begin with.  Exploding fuel prices in the Biden admin gave Russia their war chest - keeping mineral prices low will deny PRC *their* war chest for the near future.
